mapper.select: select c.coupon_name as couponName, dc.quantity as quantity, c.id as couponId, c.discount_amount as discountAmount, c.discount_type as discountType from discount_coupon_ownership dc, coupon c where user = #{userId} and dc.coupon_code = c.id
mapper.insert: insert into payment_info_type(method_name, created_date, modified_date) values (#{payType}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp)

insert into pay_info( created_date, modified_date, additional_requests, final_price, original_price, phone_number, reservation_email, reservation_name, used_points, coupon_code_id, item, payment_info_type, phone_country_code, item_ticket_deal ) values ( #{createdDate}, #{modifiedDate}, #{additionalRequests}, #{finalPrice}, #{originalPrice}, #{phoneNumber}, #{reservationEmail}, #{reservationName}, #{usedPoints}, #{couponCodeId}, #{itemId}, #{paymentInfoTypeId}, #{phoneCountryCodeId}, #{itemTicketDealId} )
mapper.update: update payInfo set is_refund = 1 where id = #{payInfoId}
